description:
A Shiden that has been customized for Shino`s personal use. At his request, thrusters have been added to the shoulders and it is equipped with a short shield. It is designed so that Shino can make use of its high mobility in battle. The cockpit seat and other parts have also been transplanted from the old Ryuusei Gou, making this the only Shiden that can use the Alaya-Vijnana system.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: STH-16/tc Shiden Kai Shino Ki (Ryuusei Gou)
